attributes.title: i miss obama😭😭
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i saw a fat ugly toad which made me hyperventilate since i have a phobia towards toad, it made me collapse and piss myself, my dad took me to the hospital where the announced me dead, overall trump app made me die😔

attributes.title: Not so greatest country in the world😣😣
attributes.review: Well, well , well. The app in itself was just so hard to download. I tried downloading it last year and this year all of a sudden it just chose to complete the downloading process. I think it’s sort of like how Donald Trump picks and chooses when he wants to say something not diagnosable as retarded. Anywho I just don’t think you should have an app praising a bro nazi fascist idiot who doesn’t work for anything he has and can’t do 6x6 to save his life. He worked with all of the world leaders we see as oppressive leaders and the sensible leaders around the world he meets don’t wanna deal with his crusty orange ass. How are we having an app dedicated to him and 2020??? It’s probably why 2020 is such a mess rn. We just gotta get this retched app of this App Store and him out of office. Yeah that’s all

attributes.title: The app is dog poop
attributes.review: It soo bad that my gramma fell down stairs

attributes.title: my tiktok is ___kid1.  ( three _’s)
attributes.review: this app is dodo💩💩 big orange god 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊 stinks 😷 i downloaded this app and he told me he’s gonna win and he hacked my number 🍊🌚💀✨✨✨ tiktok is my life if you delete it charli D won’t vote for you and her 46 M follower won’t either 😭💀 we want our president to be packing not lacking 😭😭 you probably stink 💩 and i almost died from this app 🥺 i just wanted to show our orange god some sweet love ❤️💕💖💔🖕🏾 and he said ur life don’t matter. HE RAPED KIDS WHY IS HE PRESIDENT?! anyways follow me on tiktok 😘.

attributes.title: Omfg worst app
attributes.review: The app gave me a virus and I am now typing this on my IPAD!! It took weeks to download and my grandpa has epilepsy and there was flashing colors and my grandpa had a seizure and there was no warning about flashing colors or anything

attributes.title: I am thoroughly dissapointed😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to show support to MY president, Mr.Trump. He is the GREATEST thing to happen to America, don’t tell me otherwise ❄️ 🇺🇸. When I tried to download the app it took a WEEK, when it finally downloaded it started to ask for my email, I typed it in and got 1000+ emails of images of rollerblades??? My loving uncle died in a rollerblading accident 2 years ago and I am REVOLTED. How did they get this information??? After receiving the images I broke my leg 🦵 from utter SHOCK. I am EXTREMELY disgusted, 0/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: Obama
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping I could find more of my kind, white cis straight males who are racist and hypocrites and also like to talk about women sexually, but when I opened it I was confronted with a lot of glitches and nothing works, my Android 1 plus was broken thanks to this app and now I have to buy a new phone, also installing the apps gave me so many viruses and all my personal data is stolen

attributes.title: Orange
attributes.review: I was downloading this app while I was watching Shrek and IT MADE MY PHONE GLITCH! IT MADE MY SHREK GO AWAY!! Now I’m mad at Mr.Orange because he prevented me from watching my shrek! 🟠=Mr.Orange 🤛🏽=small punch 🟠🤛🏽 REEEEE
